home-page.title: Find an archival case online ― easily!
home-page.description: Duck Inspector is a search service that allows you to find an archive case online. Just enter the details of the archive, fund, description, and case and get a link to the source.

daily-updates-page.title: Daily Report
daily-updates-page.description: A list of new archive cases found online in the last 24 hours.
daily-updates-page.limit-note: The maximum number of findings is limited to 25,000.

metadata.title: Duck Inspector ― search for Ukrainian archive cases online
metadata.description: A service for searching Ukrainian archive cases available online. Enter the case details in a simple search window and get a link to the source.
metadata.fund-description: Search for cases online in the fund {archiveCode}-{fundCode}{fundTitle} / archive {archiveCode} fund {fundCode} / {archiveCode} f.{fundCode}
metadata.description-description: Search for cases online in the description {archiveCode}-{fundCode}-{descriptionCode}{descriptionTitle} / archive {archiveCode} fund {fundCode} description {descriptionCode} / {archiveCode} f.{fundCode}, d.{descriptionCode}
metadata.case-description: Case online {archiveCode}-{fundCode}-{descriptionCode}-{caseCode}{caseTitle} / archive {archiveCode} fund {fundCode} description {descriptionCode} case {caseCode} / {archiveCode} f.{fundCode}, d.{descriptionCode}, c.{caseCode}
